price: Ammas yeroo Nuti ummata fir’awn jalaa nagaya isin baafne san (yaadadhaa). kan hamtuu adabbii isin dhandhamsiisaa turan, kan ilmaan dhiiraa keessan gorra’aniifi dubartoota keessan dhiisan.Sana keessa balaa guddaa Gooftaa keessan irraa ta’etu jira.
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيُونَ نِسَآءَكُمۡۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُم بَلَآءٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh najjaynākum min āli fir'ʿawna yasūmūnakum sūa al-ʿadhābi yudhabbiḥūna abnāakum wayastaḥyūna nisāakum wafī dhālikum balāon min rabbikum ʿaẓīmun
